attributes.action: See justice is given to all who have missed out on equal pay compensation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Equal pay was not given to workers who work in Church Schools.Some Council Employee's work in both type 's of Schools but only received payments from the Council run ones,this seems to discriminate on the people working in Church Schools doing exactly the same work i.e cleaning & dinner ladies.If the government gave the Councils funding it would help all concerned.
